title: Beef carpaccio salad with truffle oil
ingredients: ['400g beef fillet in one piece, trimmed of any fat', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '2 tablespoons Dijon mustard', 'Maldon sea salt', '5 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '4 handfuls rocket leaves', 'Parmesan cheese, shaved with a potato peeler or microplane', 'freshly ground black pepper', 'truffle oil']
